item.title: Centos 7 Resize Partition
item.description: Step to reproduce on VM Turn off the VM qemu-img resize image.qcow2 +SIZE where SIZE is the size to add (e.g. 10G for 10 gibibytes). Turn on the VM, fdisk /dev/vda, delete and create /dev/vda2, restart Login after restart, then run this command pvresize /dev/vda2 lvextend -r -l +100%FREE /dev/mapper/centos-root df -hl Referensi: https://maunium.net/blog/resizing-qcow2-images/
